def student_evaluation_function():
    score = 0
    score += bulkhours.is_equal(data_test=student.square(2), data_ref=4, max_score=1.0, min_score=0)

    score += bulkhours.is_equal(data_test=student.square(3), data_ref=teacher.square(3), max_score=1.0, min_score=0)

    score += bulkhours.is_equal(data_test=student.square(np.array([5,6,7])), max_score=1.0, data_ref=teacher.square(np.array([5,6,7])), min_score=0)

    return score
